title: eBay : gross merchandise volume 2014 to 2019
yAxis: Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars 24.64 is found at Quarter Q4 '18 and the minimum is found at Q3 '15 where Quarter is 19.6.
The highest value at Quarter Q4 '18 is 1.26x times more than the lowest value at Q3 '15.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars for 23 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 '18 has the highest Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars and Q3 '15 has the lowest Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars is found at Quarter Q4 '17.
The difference of Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Quarter is 5.04.
Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars at Quarter Q4 '18 is 24.64 , second place is Q4 '17 at 24.43, and thirdly is Q2 '18 at 23.63.
The Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars has declined over the past 23 Quarters.
The Quarter Q4 '18 has 1.13 times more Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars than average.
The Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars is 500.7 if we add up values of all Quarters.
